biotools.summary: Annotate microscopy time series of complex cell surfaces with 3D virtual reality (VR). It allows the annotation of colour surfaces segmented from microscopy movies using either a VR headset and controllers, or computer screen with mouse and keyboard.

bioschemas.name: MiCellAnnGELo
